• Name: nginx
  • Requirement: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Exposes ports: 0.0.0:80, 0.0.0.0:443
  • Installation notes: No

Additional keys:

  • extra_vars['fqdn']: Optional. By default the serverâ€™s hostname is used as the FQDN in Nginx. You can override this using this key.

Installs the official Nginx docker container.

This role is used as a building block for all web applications. Roles, such as WordPress, are configured as reverse proxy items inside Nginx.
